context-param.description: A simple page indicating a successful request to the framework.
A simple page indicating an error was hit. If this page is seen, consult the framework logs.
The parametric processing is a muti-stage operation. This JSP renders the request interface.
The parametric processing is a muti-stage operation. This servlet finishes the process.
The parametric processing is a muti-stage operation. This servlet finishes the process.
The URL to reference as an include of the JSAPI function library
The path (on the iServer) to the BIRT report that powers the mobile framework interface

servlet.description: Instantiates the Singleton that acts as the sole source for application properties.
The authenticated user's list of mobilized content.
Handles the processing of a content request by translating a subscription ID into a content stream.
Used to generate an encrypted string that can then be safely stored on the mobile client.
Prepares a parametric request for passage onto the request JSP
Target for the parametric JSP. Accects the request and generates the requested content.
Target for the parametric JSP. Accects the request and generates the requested content.
Gives the user the ability to add or update a note associated with a specific subscription ID
If a subscription has a note associated with it, this servlet will remove it permanently.
Uses XSL to extract parameters and bookmarks form a report design
